Create Tessellations From SF Object

Source: R/ar_tessellate.R
ar_tessellate.Rd

Create Tessellations From SF Object

ar_tessellate(.data, shape = "square", size = 1)

Arguments

.data

An object of class sf to tessellate from
shape

One of 'square' or 'hexagon', the shape to make tessellations from
size

Numeric multiplier for size of tessellations, default is one kilometer

Value

A sf object

Examples

ar_tessellate(ar_stl_wards)
#> Simple feature collection with 215 features and 0 fields
#> geometry type:  POLYGON
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: 733361.8 ymin: 4268336 xmax: 746361.8 ymax: 4296336
#> CRS:            EPSG:26915
#> First 10 features:
#>                          geometry
#> 1  POLYGON ((737361.8 4268336,...
#> 2  POLYGON ((738361.8 4268336,...
#> 3  POLYGON ((739361.8 4268336,...
#> 4  POLYGON ((737361.8 4269336,...
#> 5  POLYGON ((738361.8 4269336,...
#> 6  POLYGON ((739361.8 4269336,...
#> 7  POLYGON ((735361.8 4270336,...
#> 8  POLYGON ((736361.8 4270336,...
#> 9  POLYGON ((737361.8 4270336,...
#> 10 POLYGON ((738361.8 4270336,...

ar_tessellate(ar_stl_wards, shape = "hexagon", size = .75)
#> Simple feature collection with 410 features and 0 fields
#> geometry type:  POLYGON
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: 732986.8 ymin: 4267903 xmax: 746486.8 ymax: 4296049
#> CRS:            EPSG:26915
#> First 10 features:
#>                          geometry
#> 1  POLYGON ((733361.8 4274398,...
#> 2  POLYGON ((733361.8 4275697,...
#> 3  POLYGON ((733736.8 4273749,...
#> 4  POLYGON ((733736.8 4275048,...
#> 5  POLYGON ((733736.8 4276347,...
#> 6  POLYGON ((733736.8 4277646,...
#> 7  POLYGON ((734111.8 4273099,...
#> 8  POLYGON ((734111.8 4274398,...
#> 9  POLYGON ((734111.8 4275697,...
#> 10 POLYGON ((734111.8 4276996,...
